title: Heidi Klum stuns in snakeskin dress and heels ahead of filming America's Got Talent in LA
text:
Heidi Klum donned a bold snakeskin dress as she was snapped headed to record America's Got Talent in Pasadena, California on Thursday.

The 46-year-old model beamed as she made her way to the Pasadena Civic Auditorium in the luxe garment, which had a hem and neckline.

The mom-of-four to daughters Leni, 15, (with ex Flavio Briatore) and Lou, 10, and sons Henry, 14, and Johan, 12 (with Seal), rounded out her ensemble with strappy snakeskin heels and diamond hoop earrings, and toted a leather yellow purse on the sunny day in Southern California.

On the move: Heidi Klum, 46, donned a bold snakeskin dress as she was snapped headed to record America's Got Talent in Pasadena, California on Thursday

Klum, who also appears on Amazon Prime's Making the Cut, donned yellow tinted sunglasses and had her dark blonde locks cut in bangs as she made her way into the facility.

Klum is gearing up for her famed Halloween celebration, Page Six reported earlier this week, with an insider saying that she's got a 'unique reveal' that's going to be 'scarier than ever' on tap this year, as it will mark the 20th anniversary of the bash.

The supermodel will host the soiree at the Moxy East Village hotel's Cathédrale, with Questlove slated for DJ duties.

Klum has a tradition of ornate, over-the-top Halloween costumes. Her past efforts include dressing up as Fiona from the Shrek films last year, Jessica Rabbit in 2015, and Cleopata in 2012.

Gorgeous: The supermodel beamed as she made her way to the Pasadena Civic Auditorium in the luxe garment, which had a hem and neckline

Accessorizing: She rounded out her ensemble with strappy snakeskin heels and diamond hoop earrings, and toted a leather yellow purse on the sunny day in Southern California

Tis' the season: Klum is gearing up for her famed Halloween celebration

Klum earlier this year married musician Tom Kaulitz, a Leipzig, Germany native who plays guitar for the band Tokio Hotel. The couple, who was first seen embracing during an America's Got Talent filming last year, tied the knot in July in Italy.

'It was so beautiful and it was the best time,' she told People earlier this month. 'I’m still wearing baggier clothes now because I just ate too much and had too much fun ... it was great ... it was so magical.'

Klum said she and her spouse are 'very similar' in that they're 'really game for anything.

'He enjoys life and is very generous,' she said. 'He’s super kind. I just found my partner finally, you know?'

Klum was previously married to stylist Ric Pipino from 1997 to 2002, and to singer Seal from 2005 until their 2012 separation.

Good spirits: The gorgeous German model laughed while entering the venue

In love: Klum earlier this year married musician Tom Kaulitz, a Leipzig, Germany native who plays guitar for the band Tokio Hotel

Beauty: Singer Alesha Dixon, 41, wore an eye-catching ensemble as she made her way onto the set
description: Klum is gearing up for her famed Halloween celebration, with an insider saying that she's got a 'unique reveal' that's going to be 'scarier than ever' on tap this year.
